awakeningSkills.bonusNotes: Does not consider the SP loss when computing for average

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] At 0+ SP, Reuse this Coin (5 times max per Skill)

data.desc:
When this Skill flips Coins, each Coin flips against a random enemy among its targets.
- The first Coin always targets the main target.
- All 'On Hit' effects and all damage dealt by each Coin are inflicted only against the random target the Coin selected.
When inflicting [SinkingWhite] with this Skill effects: (Chance to flip Heads)% chance to inflict The Departed. If this unit did not inflict The Departed, inflict The Living instead. (calculates every [SinkingWhite] stack independently)
data.name: Solemn Lament

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] At 0+ SP, Reuse this Coin (5 times max per Skill)

data.desc:
When this Skill flips Coins, each Coin flips against a random enemy among its targets.
- The first Coin always targets the main target.
- All 'On Hit' effects and all damage dealt by each Coin are inflicted only against the random target the Coin selected.
When inflicting [SinkingWhite] with this Skill effects: (Chance to flip Heads)% chance to inflict The Departed. If this unit did not inflict The Departed, inflict The Living instead. (calculates every [SinkingWhite] stack independently)
[EndSkill] Heal (# of Coin 3 hits x 2) SP
data.name: Solemn Lament

corrosionSkills.bonusNotes: Assumes 5 The Living and 5 The Departed for the final bonus Gloom damage

data.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
If target has less than 0 SP, deal more damage the further their SP value is from 0 (+1% damage for every missing SP, max 45%)
Against targets without SP: deal +1% damage for every 2 [Sinking] on target (max 45%)
data.name: Solemn Lament

data.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
If target has less than 0 SP, deal more damage the further their SP value is from 0 (+1% damage for every missing SP, max 45%)
Against targets without SP: deal +1% damage for every 2 [Sinking] on target (max 45%)
[EnemyKill] Heal 5 SP
data.name: Solemn Lament

descs:
[OnSucceedAttack] If target has 50%- HP, inflict Gloom Damage equal to "All" [SinkingWhite] values on target
- "All" = the sum of both The Living and The Departed on target

passiveList.desc:
Turn End: if this unit has a negative effect, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn
When attacking targets that are either in Panic or in E.G.O Corrosion: deal +15% damage
passiveList.name: Lament
